aws_route53_resolver_rule_association.description: Provides a Route53 Resolver rule association.

resolver_rule_id.description: The ID of the resolver rule that you want to associate with the VPC.

vpc_id.description: The ID of the VPC that you want to associate the resolver rule with.

name.description: A name for the association that you're creating between a resolver rule and a VPC.

id.description: The ID of the resolver rule association.
